ingredients.ingredient: 3 pounds skinned and boned cobia fillet
1 cup barbecue sauce, or as needed

cookingTips: Wrap fish pieces with bacon strips spiraling around them before skewering
Use two skewers per pinwheel to prevent spinning during grilling
Pre-cook bacon partially so it crisps properly alongside the fish
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user on wrapping delicate fish with bacon and using double skewers for stability during cooking.
